entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rocky Mountain House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rocky Mountain House 2:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -24.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -30.1°C
Wind: SE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
